vehicles.description: Parked cars on the right side of the road, various colors and models, not currently in motion but positioned close to the driving lane.
vehicles.explanation: These vehicles represent potential hazards should any of the car doors open or if a vehicle unexpectedly pulls out into the lane.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Motorcyclist ahead in the same lane as the ego vehicle, wearing a white helmet and riding a red and black motorcycle.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The motorcyclist is a moving vehicle that directly influences the speed and following distance of the ego car.

suggestions: The ego car should maintain a safe following distance behind the motorcycle, being prepared for potential changes in its movement or speed. Move cautiously around the parked cars, watching for any doors opening or pedestrians, and continue following the lane markings on the clear road. Reduce speed appropriately if the road conditions or traffic density change unexpectedly.
